title: Buying sets, near sets, bulk, misc, premium singles, and complete collections
author: Sean1125

posts.post_title: Buying sets, near sets, bulk, misc, premium singles, and complete collections
posts.post_content:
I will pay between 70 and 80% of their value-- I offer a quick, easy, and hassle free transaction at any dollar value via Paypal and check. The answer to "am I interested" is yes on every collection large and small. No collection is too large and I will travel for 6 and 7 figure deals.

Please message me here or email below.

Kind Regards,

Sean
I just want to vouch for Sean. He's very fair and has helped me finance a couple of private collection buys through purchase of my duplicates.

Todd,

Thank you for the kind words and I wish you the best of luck collecting.

Kind Regards,

Sean
Please let me know what you have.

Looking for 6 and 7 figure deals.

Will travel.
Merry Christmas. I hope everyone has a peaceful near year. Please contact me if you need a fair offer on your collection of any size.

I will pay between 70 and 80% of their value-- I offer a quick, easy, and hassle free transaction at any dollar value via Paypal and check. The answer to "am I interested" is yes on every collection large and small. No collection is too large and I will travel for 6 and 7 figure deals.

Please message me here or email below.

Kind Regards,

Sean
